title: Pirate or Bilgewater jinx.
body: Fishbones will be a actual  shark that spews out explosives or explosive vomit, her minigun will be a small cannon that shoots out small cannonballs in short bursts. zap will be a pistol similar to miss fortunes that fires out a quick bullet. traps on ground will be a skull of razorfins with mechanicle bits inside it to make it work. Ult will be a hugh mungus (get it?) cannonball from fishbones. jinx will look like a pirate
